text: Born on the Fourth of July is an American 1989 biographical movie. Ron Kovic is played by Tom Cruise. Kyra Sedgwick plays Donna. Holly Marie Combs plays Jenny. The movie is about the Vietnam War and veterans. This movie was released on December 20, 1989. The movie got very positive reviews from movie critics. It made a lot of money. == Other websites == * Category:1989 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:1989 war movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:American war movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Vietnam War movies Category:Movies about veterans Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Oliver Stone Category:Movies composed by John Williams
title: Born on the Fourth of July
